translation.en: You're... a... b- b...
big... g... girl... now.
Marcy?
I gotta leave early tonight. You all right alone?
translation.es: Debo irme temprano hoy. ¿Estarás bien sola?

translation.en: I'm... I'm fine.
Don't forget to take your break. You work too hard.
I won't. I won't.
Bye, Tory.
- - Don't!
David gave that to me! David gave that to me!
translation.es: ¡David me lo dio! ¡David me lo dio!

translation.en: - David-- -
Aah!
That's mine.
Holy shit.
Trevor. You stay down, man. He's better than you.
translation.es: Trevor, no te levantes. Es mejor que tú.

translation.en: - You can stay down, man! - Shut up!
You should've stayed down.
Trevor! Trevor!
I concede the fight.
- Do we need to cut it? - Nah.
It's okay. It's okay. It's almost ready.
translation.es: Todo está bien, está casi listo.

translation.en: Carly?
Carly?  You're not coming in like that.
You promised, Jeff.
Come on, Carly. Don't make me mad. I gotta take a piss.
translation.es: Vamos, no me hagas enfadar. Tengo que hacer pis.

translation.en: Not supposed to be here when you drink.
- Why is he crying? - He's just hungry.
Give him something to eat! I'm warming it up.
translation.es: - Entonces ¡dale algo de comer! - Lo estoy calentando.

translation.en: What is this shit?
It's baby food. He's a baby, Jeff.
translation.es: Es comida para bebé. Es un bebé, Jeff.

translation.en: Don't talk to me like I'm an idiot.
translation.es: No me hables como si fuera idiota.

translation.en: This is bullshit. Yo, come on!
Hey, all you're doing is pissing me off!
translation.es: ¡Solo logras hacerme enfadar! HORA REGISTRADA DE LA MUERTE 00:04

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry. You make me crazy.
translation.es: Escucha, lo siento. Me vuelves loco.

translation.en: You need to go.
All right. I'm going.
Ruok?
Ru- ok?
You're up early.
- - The headache wake you? The sound of birds.
translation.es: - ¿La jaqueca te despertó? - No, el cantar de los pájaros.

translation.en: Know how stupid it is to pick a fight before a game?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo estúpido que es pelear antes de un juego?

translation.en: How do you throw a football with a broken hand?
translation.es: ¿Cómo arrojarás un balón con una mano rota?

translation.en: Doctors are more concerned with his concussion.
translation.es: Los doctores están más preocupados por la conmoción.

translation.en: You blow your chance at a scholarship,
translation.es: Si pierdes una posible beca, superestrella...

translation.en: you better start learning to flip burgers.
All right. You scoot upstairs. Get ready.
translation.es: - ...deberás hacer hamburguesas. - Suficiente. Ve arriba, prepárate. Querían verte otra vez por la mañana.

translation.en: They wanted to see you again in the morning.
translation.es: Ve arriba, prepárate. Querían verte otra vez por la mañana.

translation.en: Thank you, Mom.
Thank you, Mom?
Who the hell's that?
Philip Pearson?
Tried to find you at the university. I'm Detective Gower.
translation.es: Te busqué en la universidad. Soy el detective Gower.

translation.en: Gower?  Your roommate passed away last night.
translation.es: - ¿Gower? - Tu compañero de cuarto murió anoche.

translation.en: You don't seem surprised.
It's me.
David?  Yeah.
Oh! That's... not appropriate.
Marcy, put some clothes on.
Yeah, I can't, uh... be your boyfriend, Marcy, w- we talked about this.
translation.es: No puedo ser tu novio, Marcy. Ya hablamos de esto.

translation.en: What's that?
What happened?
Uh... I fell.  And you just went home?
translation.es: - Me caí. - ¿Y te fuiste a casa?

translation.en: Oh, kiddo, are you okay? Does it hurt?
I'm fine.
Well, I know going to the doctor's
translation.es: Estoy bien. Sé que no te agrada ir al médico, pero...

translation.en: not your favorite thing in the world, but...
translation.es: Sé que no te agrada ir al médico, pero...

translation.en: That's a-- That's a nasty cut.
Is this appropriate?
Appropriate? Sure.
Maybe some underwear.
So you skipped out?  I just walked.
translation.es: - Entonces, te fuiste rápido. - Me marché.

translation.en: And the loaded syringe we found on the table, that wasn't meant for you?
translation.es: ¿Y la jeringa cargada que hallamos en la mesa no era para ti?

translation.en: Uh, what difference does it make?
Did Stephen inject himself, or did you do it for him?
translation.es: ¿Qué importancia tiene eso? ¿Stephen se inyectó solo o tú lo ayudaste?

translation.en: Because your prints were found on both syringes.
translation.es: Porque tus huellas estaban en ambas jeringas.

translation.en: I was there, but then I- I left.
translation.es: Yo estaba allí, pero luego me fui.

translation.en: Yeah...
because you knew he was gonna O.D.
translation.es: Porque sabías que tendría una sobredosis.

translation.en: Yeah, you knew.
You know, a phone call to 911 could've saved his life.
translation.es: Una llamada al 911 podría haberlo salvado.

translation.en: That's cold, Philip.
Either way, you have got a problem.
translation.es: De todos modos, tienes un problema.

translation.en: On top of your drug problem.
I don't have a drug problem.
I know who your dealer is.
translation.es: No tengo una adicción. Sé quién es tu vendedor y cuánto compras cada semana.

translation.en: I know how much you buy.
translation.es: Sé quién es tu vendedor y cuánto compras cada semana.

translation.en: I know who your friends are and where you're from.
translation.es: Sé quiénes son tus amigos y de dónde eres.

translation.en: You have no idea where I'm from.
translation.es: No tiene idea de dónde soy.

translation.en: You inject somebody, they O.D., that's manslaughter.
translation.es: Si inyectas a alguien y sufre una sobredosis, es homicidio.

translation.en: I have the right to court- appointed legal counsel, yes?
translation.es: Tengo derecho a un abogado de oficio.

translation.en: Sure you don't want to call your parents instead?
You think you're sick now, wait till your lawyer shows up.
translation.es: Si crees que te sientes mal ahora, espera a que llegue tu abogado.

translation.en: I'm proud of you, you know.
What? What for?
You got knocked in the head last night, and you're...
you know, the naked thing, that-- that was weird,
translation.es: Si bien lo del nudismo fue extraño,

translation.en: but otherwise, you're handling this amazingly well.
translation.es: Si bien lo del nudismo fue extraño, más allá de eso, lo estás llevando muy bien.

translation.en: Hey, it's Thursday.
It's reading- aloud day.
There's no point in wasting time sitting on a bus.
translation.es: No tiene sentido desperdiciar el tiempo sentados en el autobús.

translation.en: It's just me. It can be anything at all.
translation.es: Estamos solos. Puede ser cualquier cosa.

translation.en: Think I got your favorite.
Police were forced to use tear gas to disperse a crowd
translation.es: La policía debió usar gas lacrimógeno para dispersar a la multitud,

translation.en: shortly after a not- guilty verdict
translation.es: tras el anuncio del veredicto de inocente.

translation.en: What?
What-- What's wrong?
You didn't answer your cell.
What did they say? I have a concussion.
Oh, no.
Will you be able to play in the game next week?
The doctor said that...
if I hadn't walked away from the fight, I might have died.
translation.es: ...si no hubiera dejado la pelea, habría muerto.

translation.en: Does it hurt now? A little.
Are your folks home? No. Why?
translation.es: - ¿Tus padres están en casa? - No. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Oh, I don't think that we should, Rene, 'cause my concussion.
translation.es: No me parece buena idea, Rene, por mi conmoción.

translation.en: Let me make you feel better.
translation.es: Deja que te haga sentir mejor.

translation.en: Look. Please, stop.
- I don't think that we should. - Are you breaking up with me?
translation.es: Creo que no deberíamos hacerlo. - ¿Estás terminando conmigo? - No.

translation.en: No!
If anything... I want to be closer to you.
translation.es: Todo lo contrario. Quiero estar más cerca de ti.

translation.en: There are things I don't remember. Things about me?
translation.es: - Hay cosas que no recuerdo. - ¿Cosas sobre mí?

translation.en: It's more things about myself.
The doctor said that a concussion as bad as this
translation.es: El doctor dijo que una conmoción tan grave puede causar

translation.en: can cause changes in personality and memory loss,
translation.es: cambios en la personalidad y pérdida de memoria.

translation.en: that the only treatment is time-- that in time I'll be the person I was before the concussion.
translation.es: Con el tiempo, seré la persona que era antes de la conmoción.

translation.en: I need you to help me remember who that person is.
Y- You want me to help you find yourself?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que te ayude a hallarte a ti mismo?

translation.en: Trev... That is so beautiful.
Look...
You should go.  I don't want to, but I will.
translation.es: - Deberías irte. - No quiero, pero lo haré.

translation.en: That's how much I love you.
Daddy's coming.
You busy right now?
Not yet. We just got sent a red flag.
translation.es: - Aún no. - Nos enviaron una alerta roja.

translation.en: Can't you handle it? I'm all over Jonas Walker.
translation.es: ¿No puedes encargarte? Estoy con Jonas Walker.

translation.en: I'm in court today and tomorrow.
What's the flag? Potential cell.
Encrypted communication in the deep web.
translation.es: Mensajes cifrados en la Internet oscura.

translation.en: I have no idea what I'm looking at.
translation.es: No tengo idea de qué estoy leyendo.

translation.en: Analyst who flagged it is hoping that they're just gamers.
translation.es: El analista que lo detectó espera que se trate de unos jugadores.

translation.en: Who travel, apparently.
Those GPS coordinates correspond to an abandoned building downtown.  And what's a T.E.L.L.?
translation.es: Esas coordenadas de GPS corresponden a un edificio abandonado en el centro.

translation.en: I asked the same question. They ran it and nothing showed up.
translation.es: - ¿Y qué significa H.A.L.L.? - Lo analizaron y no surgió nada.

translation.en: Aw, shit, I'm late.
It's probably nothing, but...
translation.es: Tal vez no sea nada, pero...

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. I got it. I'll let you know.
Have fun in court.
Make sure Jonas Walker doesn't shoot anyone while I'm gone.
translation.es: Asegúrate de que Jonas Walker no le dispare a nadie en mi ausencia.

translation.en: You didn't coach her?
translation.es: TERAPEUTA DEL HABLA - ¿No le enseñaste? - Ninguna enseñanza puede lograr eso.

translation.en: No amount of coaching can do that.
translation.es: - ¿No le enseñaste? - Ninguna enseñanza puede lograr eso.

translation.en: Marcy has a significant intellectual disability.
translation.es: Sabes que Marcy tiene una discapacidad intelectual marcada.

translation.en: Yeah. Had.
You want to think something wonderful's happened,
translation.es: Sé que quieres creer que sucedió algo maravilloso,

translation.en: but no traumatic brain injury is going to increase intellectual capacity.
translation.es: pero ningún daño cerebral aumenta la capacidad intelectual.

translation.en: It's just not possible. Which brings us back to miracle.
translation.es: - No es posible. - Entonces, estamos ante un milagro.

translation.en: Assuming that there was a traumatic injury, likely a concussion,
translation.es: Si tuvo una lesión traumática como una conmoción,

translation.en: the most common symptoms would be memory loss, change in personality--
translation.es: los síntomas más comunes serían amnesia, cambio de personalidad...

translation.en: So... What if this is the real Marcy?
translation.es: - ¿Entonces? - ¿Y si esta es la verdadera Marcy?

translation.en: Seriously?
Up until the age of 18, Marcy lived in an institution,
translation.es: ¿En serio? Hasta los 18, Marcy vivió en una institución

translation.en: one with a reputation for neglect and abuse,
translation.es: Hasta los 18, Marcy vivió en una institución con una reputación de negligencia y abuso, hasta que la cerraron.

translation.en: right up until the time it was shut down.
translation.es: con una reputación de negligencia y abuso, hasta que la cerraron. Ella no habla de eso.

translation.en: She doesn't talk about that.
Maybe the Marcy we knew was her way of coping there,
translation.es: Quizá la Marcy que conocíamos actuaba como en esa época,

translation.en: her way of making people look after her,
translation.es: era su modo de hacer que la gente cuidara de ella,

translation.en: and she just continued that behavior after her release, and when she hit her head...
translation.es: y continuó con ese comportamiento después de irse, y cuando se golpeó...

translation.en: She just forgot who she was pretending to be? That's crazy.
translation.es: ¿Se olvidó de quién fingía ser? Es una locura.

translation.en: It's infinitely more possible than her I.Q. doubling overnight.
translation.es: Es infinitamente más posible que duplicar su CI de la nada.

translation.en: I've been her caseworker since her release.
translation.es: Soy su asistente social desde su alta. Eso fue hace más de un año.

translation.en: - That was over a year ago! - My case in point.
translation.es: Soy su asistente social desde su alta. Eso fue hace más de un año. Ese es el punto.

translation.en: You got her a subsidized apartment,
translation.es: Ese es el punto. Le conseguiste un hogar subsidiado y un empleo en la biblioteca.

translation.en: a job at the library.
translation.es: Le conseguiste un hogar subsidiado y un empleo en la biblioteca.

translation.en: You see her four or five times a week--
translation.es: Le conseguiste un hogar subsidiado y un empleo en la biblioteca. - La ves hasta cinco veces por semana. - ¿Dices que me engañó?

translation.en: You're saying she played me?
translation.es: - La ves hasta cinco veces por semana. - ¿Dices que me engañó?

translation.en: The most innocent soul I've ever met.
translation.es: Tiene el alma más pura que conozco.

translation.en: Played the system. Fooled me, too.
translation.es: Engañó al sistema. Y también a mí.

translation.en: So she could live in a flophouse full of crackheads,
translation.es: ¿Para vivir en un edificio repleto de drogadictos

translation.en: work nights at a library for the rest of her adult life?
translation.es: y trabajar en una biblioteca por el resto de su vida?

translation.en: No, you're right. She's a mastermind. She's a James Bond villain.
translation.es: No, tienes razón. Es un genio. Es una villana de James Bond.

translation.en: Neural pathways can't spring up overnight. Vocabulary doesn't come out of nowhere.
translation.es: Ni las vías neurales ni el vocabulario aparecen de la nada.

translation.en: And what's happened to her stutter?
Is something wrong?
You're... a...
big...
girl... now,
said... Mary...
Tee-- Teacher.
- - Good.
Do you remember that?
It was just a few months ago.
I don't understand.  Neither do we.
I'd like to find out what else you don't remember.
translation.es: Me gustaría saber qué más no recuerdas.

translation.en: It's okay... I'm here.
Let's start with yesterday.
Where were you?
translation.es: Comencemos con ayer. - ¿Dónde estabas? - En la biblioteca.

translation.en: At the library.
Good.
What did you do at the library?
I'm a librarian, so I was...
translation.es: - ¿Qué hacías allí? - Soy una bibliotecaria. Así que estaba... ¿Sacabas y regresabas libros, ayudabas a la gente en las búsquedas?

translation.en: So you were checking books in and out, helping folks find what they were looking for?
translation.es: ¿Sacabas y regresabas libros, ayudabas a la gente en las búsquedas?

translation.en: Yes.
And can you name one of those people? David.
Uh, to do research. He's a reporter.
translation.es: Para su investigación. Es un reportero.

translation.en: Marcy, stop.
What's wrong?
You being a librarian,
me going there to do research for a newspaper I work for--
translation.es: ¿Tú eres una bibliotecaria? ¿Yo investigo para un periódico?

translation.en: those are all part of a profile page that we made up.
translation.es: Todo forma parte de un perfil que inventamos.

translation.en: That's my profile. We created it as an exercise...
translation.es: - Es mi perfil. - Lo creamos como un ejercicio.

translation.en: so I could teach you about social media
translation.es: Era para enseñarte sobre las redes sociales

translation.en: and other things about the world.
Remember?
You're not a librarian. You work there as a cleaning lady.
translation.es: No eres una bibliotecaria. Trabajas en limpieza.

translation.en: I'm not a reporter.
I'm your social worker.
So... so what... you're saying is... that--
translation.es: Entonces... - Lo que quieres decir es... - Solo intentamos entender.

translation.en: We're just trying to understand.
translation.es: - Lo que quieres decir es... - Solo intentamos entender.

translation.en: Marcy?
Take it you're not Leticia.
Wrong file.
Go ahead, have a seat.
Sit.
You look like shit, Philip. When was the last time you hit?
translation.es: Te ves muy mal, Philip. ¿Cuándo fue tu última dosis?

translation.en: - I don't use drugs. - Come on, man.
You don't have to pretend. I know all about addiction.
translation.es: Vamos, no tienes que fingir conmigo. Sé todo sobre adicciones.

translation.en: Trust me. Mine's just legal.
translation.es: Créeme. Solo que la mía es legal.

translation.en: Have they talked to you at all about the methadone program they got going on?
- What is it? - Methadone?
Your addiction.
Is it gambling?
Cigarettes.
Look, I'm just trying to be simpatico here. Don't be a dick.
translation.es: Mira, solo intento ser simpático. No seas un imbécil.

translation.en: I apologize.
We're gonna plea. You'll end up doing some time. There's no way around that.
translation.es: Te declararás culpable. Deberás cumplir una condena, no hay opción.

translation.en: They got you two ways, all right?
But, in the meantime-- Are you bound by attorney- client privilege?
translation.es: - Pero mientras tanto... - ¿Gozo del secreto profesional?

translation.en: Can you guarantee your confidence
if I tell you information that can help us both?
translation.es: si te digo algo que nos ayudará a ambos?

translation.en: Absolutely. What?
I'm so sorry.
Come on, you love... You love making up after we fight.
translation.es: Vamos, te encanta... la reconciliación tras una pelea.

translation.en: That wasn't a fight. You struck me.
translation.es: Eso no fue una pelea. Me golpeaste.

translation.en: If I hadn't demanded you leave, you would've struck me again.
translation.es: Si no te hubieras ido, lo habrías vuelto a hacer.

translation.en: From now on, you'll be allowed to see your son once a day
translation.es: Desde ahora, solo podrás ver a tu hijo una hora por día.

translation.en: for one hour, time to be arranged.
translation.es: Desde ahora, solo podrás ver a tu hijo una hora por día. - A convenir. - Lo veré cuando quiera, Carly.

translation.en: I see him when I wanna see him.
translation.es: - A convenir. - Lo veré cuando quiera, Carly.

translation.en: Also, you'll provide proper financial support.
Okay. Okay, okay. I get it.
Let me make it up to you.
What do you want me to do?
Change Jeffrey's diaper.
Hey! Phil!
You got out quick. What'd they tell you?
They didn't say anything. They just let me go.
Come here, come here. Come here for a sec.
How did you know?
Come on, man. Three horses? Three races, three different cities--
translation.es: Vamos. Tres caballos, tres carreras, tres ciudades.

translation.en: all 20 to one or better?
The bets were so stupid, I had to go to three bookies.
translation.es: Las apuestas eran tan estúpidas que tuve que ir a tres corredores.

translation.en: I wouldn't have done it if you hadn't fronted the cash advance.
translation.es: No lo habría hecho si no me hubieras dado el efectivo.

translation.en: It's all here, by the way, with interest. Credit card's in there.
translation.es: Está todo, con intereses. La tarjeta de crédito está allí.

translation.en: Go ahead. Take it. Come on, come on.
You gotta tell me.
Do I still have attorney- client privilege? Yeah, sure, whatever. Yep. Yep.
translation.es: - ¿Aún tengo el secreto profesional? - Sí, claro, lo que sea.

translation.en: I'm from the future.
Okay, I get it, you can't tell me.
But Phil... you're gonna need me.
The cops are gonna be all over you. We gotta look after each other here. All right?
translation.es: La policía te seguirá. Debemos cuidarnos entre nosotros.

translation.en: Oh, speaking of which--
There's something extra in there for you, from the lock- up.
translation.es: Hay algo extra para ti. Del calabozo.

translation.en: Just a little taste so you don't get sick.
translation.es: Solo un poco para que no te enfermes.

translation.en: David?
There she is.
What happened?
Dr. Lee says you had a seizure.
translation.es: La Dra. Lee dice que tuviste una convulsión.

translation.en: It's the diminished capacity. There's too much pre- existing damage.
translation.es: Es la capacidad disminuida. Hay mucho daño preexistente.

translation.en: What?
How did I get-- ? We had to take you to the hospital.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo...? ¿Cómo llegué aquí? - Debimos traerte al hospital.

translation.en: You've been out of it all day.
Soon as you feel up to it, they wanna run tests--
translation.es: En cuanto estés lista, quieren hacerte unos exámenes.

translation.en: - No, please. - It's not up to me.
translation.es: - No, por favor. - No depende de mí.

translation.en: I can't be in the hospital.
translation.es: No puedo estar en el hospital.

translation.en: - Marcy. - Listen to me.
I have important work to do. At the library?
translation.es: - Tengo algo importante que hacer. - ¿En la biblioteca?

translation.en: No, not at the library.
This is all happening for a reason.
translation.es: Todo esto sucede por una razón.

translation.en: Okay. How about I go get the doctor and we can talk about this?
translation.es: Bueno. ¿Qué tal si busco al doctor para hablar de esto?

translation.en: Thank you.  Okay.
- Forbes. - Hey.
How's Judge What's- His- Nuts?
translation.es: - ¿Cómo va todo con el juez? - Aún es un imbécil.

translation.en: Still an asshole. How's our potential shooter?
translation.es: - ¿Cómo va todo con el juez? - Aún es un imbécil. - ¿Y nuestro posible tirador? - No sale de su casa hace una semana.

translation.en: Jonas Walker hasn't left his house in a week.
translation.es: - ¿Y nuestro posible tirador? - No sale de su casa hace una semana.

translation.en: Starting to think we're wasting our time on that one.
translation.es: Creo que desperdiciamos el tiempo con Walker.

translation.en: Our chatroom, on the other hand, has been filling up all day with the same weird messages.
translation.es: Pero la sala de chat tuvo todo el día los mismos mensajes extraños.

translation.en: I.P.s all over town.
translation.es: Son direcciones de IP de toda la ciudad.

translation.en: You think it's something? Gotta admit, it's making me curious.
translation.es: - ¿Crees que haya algo detrás? - Debo admitir que me da curiosidad.

translation.en: The one who set up the chatroom was arrested and released on a technicality.
translation.es: Quien instaló la sala de chat fue arrestado y liberado.

translation.en: Might save time if you contact the arresting officer.
translation.es: Quizá ahorres tiempo si contactas al oficial del arresto.

translation.en: Name's Gower.
Okay. Bright and early.
translation.es: - Se llama Gower. - Está bien. A primera hora.

translation.en: Marcy, what're you doing here?
I was at your apartment! I've been worried!
translation.es: Acabo de ir a tu apartamento. Estaba preocupado.

translation.en: I didn't know where else to go.
translation.es: Acabo de ir a tu apartamento. Estaba preocupado. No sabía adónde ir.

translation.en: What is going on?
Tell me. I can't.
A mistake's been made, and I'm not sure how to correct it.
translation.es: Se cometió un error y no sé cómo corregirlo.

translation.en: I don't even know if it can be.
Just... know that I'm playing a small part in something that's important.
translation.es: Solo sé que cumplo un pequeño papel en algo importante.

translation.en: Well, what does that even mean?  I couldn't explain it if I tried.
translation.es: - ¿Qué significa eso? - No podría explicarlo aunque quisiera.

translation.en: Please... just trust me anyway.
translation.es: Por favor. Confía en mí de todos modos.

translation.en: Morning. Sorry to bother you so early.
translation.es: Buenos días. Siento molestar tan temprano.

translation.en: I'm Special Agent Grant MacLaren with the FBI.
translation.es: Soy el agente especial Grant MacLaren del FBI.

translation.en: FBI? Really?
Really.
A message was sent from this I.P. address--
translation.es: Se envió un mensaje desde esta dirección de IP,

translation.en: that just means one of the computers in your house-- kinda raised a flag in our system.
translation.es: Es decir, de una de las computadoras de la casa, y se activó una alerta.

translation.en: Please tell me this is not about Internet porn.
translation.es: Por favor, dígame que no es por pornografía.

translation.en: No. Not porn. At least, I- I don't think so.
translation.es: No es por pornografía. Al menos, no lo creo.

translation.en: No, this is more of a chatroom conversation.
translation.es: No es por pornografía. Al menos, no lo creo. Es por una conversación en una sala de chat.

translation.en: Ah. My son's always in those rooms.
translation.es: Es por una conversación en una sala de chat. Mi hijo siempre está en esas salas.

translation.en: Is he a gamer, by any chance? Video games?
It's all he ever does.
That, and the other thing.
translation.es: Es lo único que hace. Eso y lo otro.

translation.en: When do you expect him home?
Said he'd be out late tonight with friends.
translation.es: Dijo que saldría hasta tarde hoy con sus amigos.

translation.en: Is he in any kind of trouble?
Nah. I doubt it. You have a good day.
translation.es: No, lo dudo. Que tenga un buen día.

translation.en: Hey. What're you doing here? What do you mean?
to stay home for the rest of the year.
translation.es: Tienes un boleto gratis para quedarte en casa el resto del año.

translation.en: And fail to graduate? Yeah, like that was gonna happen!
translation.es: - ¿Y no graduarme? - Sí, como si eso fuera a suceder.

translation.en: Can I ask you something without telling everyone?
translation.es: ¿Puedo preguntarte algo sin que se enteren todos?

translation.en: - Yeah. - Honestly?
- Yeah, God, what is it? - Which locker is mine?
You mean you got, like, brain damage?
Post- concussion syndrome.
Yeah. It's, uh... it's right here.
You want me to show you the combo? Please.
translation.es: - ¿Te muestro la combinación? - Sí, por favor.

translation.en: Why is this body always so tired?
translation.es: - Hola. - ¿Por qué este cuerpo sigue cansado?

translation.en: This body? Well, maybe 'cause it works nights.
translation.es: ¿Este cuerpo? Tal vez porque trabaja de noche.

translation.en: This body just made breakfast.
That's very kind.
And you're naked again.
Okay. How about you get dressed before joining me?
translation.es: Bueno. ¿Qué tal si te vistes antes de desayunar conmigo?

translation.en: David?
If I could tell you, I would.
Hey, as long as you're not an assassin or a Hollywood actress researching a character.
translation.es: Está bien, mientras no seas una asesina o una actriz investigando un papel.

translation.en: Those-- Those are the... two worst- case scenarios I came up with while I was laying awake all night.
translation.es: Son las peores cosas que imaginé mientras no podía dormir.

translation.en: Gower. Morning. Grant MacLaren, FBI.
translation.es: - Gower. - Buenos días. Grant MacLaren, FBI.

translation.en: I'm investigating a 20- year- old male you booked yesterday--
translation.es: - Gower. - Buenos días. Grant MacLaren, FBI. Investigo a un hombre de 20 años que arrestó ayer.

translation.en: - Philip Pearson, yeah. - That's him.
Well, I guess you heard he won the lottery yesterday, huh?
translation.es: - Sí. - Habrá oído que ganó la lotería.

translation.en: - You had to drop the charges? - No, he won the fucking lottery.
translation.es: - ¿Desestimaron los cargos? - No, digo que ganó la lotería.

translation.en: Six numbers outta seven. 92- grand and change.
translation.es: Seis números de siete. Ganó más de 92 000.

translation.en: Lucky kid.
Not if I catch him with that bag of smack he's walking around with.
translation.es: No si lo atrapo con la bolsa de droga que sé que tiene.

translation.en: Our system red- flagged him as a potential member of a terrorist cell.
translation.es: Podría ser un miembro de una célula terrorista.

translation.en: I got the rest of the suspects covered, but if you could watch this one--
translation.es: Ya cubrí al resto de los sospechosos, pero ¿puede vigilar a este por mí?

translation.en: Agent MacLaren, there's no way in hell this kid's a terrorist.
translation.es: Agente MacLaren, es imposible que este joven sea un terrorista.

translation.en: Yeah? What were the odds he was gonna win the lottery?
translation.es: ¿Y qué posibilidades tenía de ganar la lotería?

translation.en: Okay. Keep this number and check in with me later.
translation.es: - Está bien. - Agende el número. Llámeme más tarde.

translation.en: Tomorrow, he's all yours.
Mm! You like that, sweetie?
Yes?
Special Agent MacLaren of the FBI.
- Sorry to bother you. - MacLaren?
How can I help you?
Our computer spits stuff out, we have to follow it up.
translation.es: A veces, en nuestras computadoras aparecen cosas y debemos seguirlas.

translation.en: - Do you live here alone? - With my son.
- How old is he? - Just over a year.
translation.es: - ¿Qué edad tiene? - Poco más de un año.

translation.en: So, no criminal record?
Sorry.
I probably know the answer to this,
translation.es: Tal vez ya sepa la respuesta,

translation.en: but do you have plans for later tonight downtown?
translation.es: pero ¿no tiene planes de ir al centro hoy por la noche?

translation.en: No. No plans.
You don't sound very sure.
I was trying to decide if you were asking me out.
translation.es: Creía que me estaba invitando a salir.

translation.en: Me? I'm-- I'm busy tonight.
Thanks for your time.
Hey! Pearson!
I wonder how much smack you can buy with 90 grand.
translation.es: Me pregunto cuánta droga puedes comprar con 90 000.

translation.en: The money's for something else.
translation.es: El dinero es para otra cosa.

translation.en: Save me the trouble of following you and just tell me.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me ahorras el trabajo de seguirte y me lo dices?

translation.en: I'm financing a secret hideout.
Sorry, kid, you're gonna have to do better than that.
translation.es: Lo siento, deberás decirme algo mejor.

translation.en: You're welcome to stay while I'm at work.
- There's nothing in the fridge-- - I'll be out before you're home.
translation.es: - No hay nada en el refrigerador... - Me iré antes de que regreses.

translation.en: I'd like to come back tonight, if that's all right.
translation.es: Pero me gustaría regresar por la noche si te parece bien.

translation.en: It'll be late, though.
I could come with you.
No. No, you should stay home tonight.
translation.es: - Podría acompañarte. - No. Deberías quedarte en casa esta noche.

translation.en: The streets won't be safe.
Wh-- What? What's gonna happen?
Oh, come on, that's going too far.
translation.es: - Vamos, esto ya es demasiado. - No debería haber dicho nada.

translation.en: - I shouldn't have said anything. - You can't expect me to--
translation.es: - Vamos, esto ya es demasiado. - No debería haber dicho nada. No puedes esperar que...

translation.en: I'll be back just after midnight.
You're Batgirl, aren't you?
Bye.
- - Shit!
Come here.
You're welcome.
Get in. Let's go. Come on.
Had to pay a kid to dare a kid to get Gower off your ass.
translation.es: Le pagué a un niño para que desafiara a otro para quitarte a Gower de encima.

translation.en: Watching your back's getting expensive, Philip. - What do you want in return? - Today's bet.
translation.es: - Cuidar tus espaldas me cuesta mucho. - ¿Qué quieres a cambio?

translation.en: I can't do it.
translation.es: - La apuesta de hoy. - No puedo hacerlo.

translation.en: Yesterday, you gave me three. I'm only asking for one.
translation.es: Ayer me diste tres. Ahora solo te pido una.

translation.en: Yesterday was an emergency. Today's kind of an emergency for me.
translation.es: - Ayer fue una emergencia. - Hoy es una emergencia para mí.

translation.en: Then you are a very bad gambler.
translation.es: Entonces eres un muy mal apostador.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm a bad gambler...
Maybe you'd like to think about it. Get out.
Pearson! Come here!
- Where are you going? - Out.
With that guy?
I don't have time for this. Well, make time.
translation.es: - No tengo tiempo para esto. - Hazte el tiempo.

translation.en: Okay! Damn it. Last warning.
Okay.
Hey! Hey!
Pearson! Stop!
Come on! Stop!
It's a good thing you stopped, kiddo.
If I had to climb that fence, I was gonna have a heart attack.
translation.es: Si tenía que trepar esa cerca, iba a darme un infarto.

translation.en: You're having one right now.  Oh, shut up.
I just need to catch my breath, that's all.
translation.es: Solo debo recuperar el aliento, eso es todo.

translation.en: Maybe you're right. My phone-- it's in the car.
translation.es: Quizá tengas razón. Mi teléfono está en el auto.

translation.en: - Help me. - I can't, Mr. Gower.
Then find someone with a phone!
translation.es: Entonces, busca a alguien con teléfono.

translation.en: I can't, I'm sorry.  You can. I won't come after you, I promise.
translation.es: - No puedo, lo siento. - Sí. Te prometo que no te perseguiré.

translation.en: You're supposed to die this afternoon.  No, you don't know--
translation.es: - Se supone que usted muera esta tarde. - No lo sabes, tú...

translation.en: I knew the moment that I heard your name.
translation.es: Lo supe en cuanto oí su nombre.

translation.en: - I just didn't know I'd be here. - Call 911 and go!
translation.es: - Solo no sabía que sería aquí. - Llama al 911 y vete.

translation.en: Because we considered you as a host.
The heart attack was inevitable within days.
translation.es: El ataque cardíaco era inevitable en pocos días.

translation.en: No... I'm okay.
I think I'm okay.
Hello?
- David Mailer? - Yeah?
Special Agent Grant MacLaren with the FBI.
translation.es: Agente especial Grant MacLaren del FBI.

translation.en: I came by earlier, left a card under your door.
translation.es: Pasé más temprano, dejé mi tarjeta bajo la puerta.

translation.en: Oh, sorry, I didn't, uh...
- I didn't see it. - Not a problem.
translation.es: Lo siento. No la vi. No importa, solo hago un seguimiento de un mensaje de chat

translation.en: Just following up on a chatroom message
translation.es: No importa, solo hago un seguimiento de un mensaje de chat

translation.en: that was sent from your I.P. address last night.
translation.es: enviado desde su dirección de IP anoche.

translation.en: You mean my computer?
Right. Tell me, do you have plans to meet anyone tonight
translation.es: - ¿Desde mi computadora? - Sí. ¿Planea ver a alguien esta noche en el centro,

translation.en: downtown, on the 12th floor of an abandoned building, about 11:17?
translation.es: en el piso 12 de un edificio abandonado a las 23:17?

translation.en: No. Why-- Why would I do that?
I guess that means I won't be seeing you there.
translation.es: Supongo que eso significa que no lo veré allí.

translation.en: I'm just thinking out loud, but sometimes I let neighbors use my Wi- Fi. Maybe that's, um--
translation.es: Estoy pensando que a veces dejo que mis vecinos usen mi wifi.

translation.en: Well, that's a federal offense, Mr. Mailer.
translation.es: - Tal vez... - Ese es un delito federal, Sr. Mailer.

translation.en: Is it?
No. I'm kidding. Have a good evening.
No. I'm not pressing charges. I just want to know where she took it.
translation.es: No presentaré cargos. Quiero saber adónde se lo llevó.

translation.en: Well, just check and keep your mouth shut.
All right. Thanks.
Hello?
I'm-- I'm trying to reach Detective Gower. I thought this was his--
translation.es: Quiero hablar con el detective Gower. Pensé que era su...

translation.en: Jesus, I'm sorry to hear that.
No, it's- it's not important. Um, thank you.
Carly?
Carly?
Got you.
You're actually all here.
We've been waiting for you.
Where's the social worker?
- David isn't one of us. - One of-- ?
translation.es: David no es uno de nosotros.

translation.en: We're travelers from the future, Agent MacLaren.
In our time, many years from now, humanity's been all but wiped out.
translation.es: En nuestra época, en un futuro lejano, la humanidad casi ha desaparecido.

translation.en: We've come back to change that.
There are thousands of travelers already here taking part.
translation.es: Ya están participando miles de viajeros.

translation.en: Okay, what do you say we, uh, travel downstairs
and talk about this somewhere else? It's not safe here.
translation.es: y hablamos de esto en otro lugar? Aquí no es seguro.

translation.en: 60 seconds. Till what?
In the future, we've developed a technology
translation.es: En el futuro, desarrollamos una tecnología para que un viajero

translation.en: that allows a traveler to project his or her conscious mind into a host body
translation.es: En el futuro, desarrollamos una tecnología para que un viajero proyecte su mente consciente al cuerpo de su huésped,

translation.en: by knowing the precise time, elevation, latitude, and longitude of their death.
translation.es: conociendo la hora, la altitud, la latitud y longitud de su muerte.

translation.en: T.E.L.L.
A Traveler's consciousness arrives moments before that historical time of death,
translation.es: La consciencia del viajero llega justo antes de la muerte del huésped,

translation.en: overriding the original host's mind,
translation.es: y así reemplaza su mente original.

translation.en: then resumes his or her life by using their knowledge
translation.es: Luego, reanuda su vida usando sus conocimientos de hechos históricos y redes sociales.

translation.en: of historical records and social media.
translation.es: usando sus conocimientos de hechos históricos y redes sociales.

translation.en: Okay, that's enough bullshit for now--
- 30 seconds. - Wait.
translation.es: - Basta de estupidez ahora. - 30 segundos. Vamos...

translation.en: Who the hell is that?
That's the body of Jonas Walker.
translation.es: Es el cuerpo de Jonas Walker.

translation.en: We stopped him from going on a shooting rampage,
as you tried and failed to do, between 11:14 and 11:17.
translation.es: Tal como usted intentó hacerlo y fracasó, entre las 23:14 y 23:17.

translation.en: 20 seconds.
We know the events of tonight because for us, they've already happened.
translation.es: Sabemos qué sucederá esta noche porque para nosotros ya sucedió.

translation.en: Just as we know during a blackout,
translation.es: Así como sabemos que, durante un apagón a las 23:17,

translation.en: at 11:17, in pursuit of Jonas Walker,
translation.es: Así como sabemos que, durante un apagón a las 23:17, el agente especial Grant MacLaren perseguía a Jonas Walker

translation.en: Special Agent Grant MacLaren
translation.es: el agente especial Grant MacLaren perseguía a Jonas Walker

translation.en: fell 45 meters down an open elevator shaft to his death.
translation.es: cayó 45 metros por el hueco de un elevador hasta su muerte.

translation.en: Three seconds.
I see we all made it.
Let's begin.
